name: ED-IT
description:
The official game made for the Git Together 1 jam!

You are a robot named Ed with the ability to dream. Use your abilities to platform through levels and dream your way around obstacles.

Features

  • Play through seven unique stages with an emphasis on different mechanics.
  • Use "dream mode" to edit your surroundings and imagine solutions to these challenges.
  • Hug giraffes.

Controls

Move - WASD / Arrow keys
Dream mode - Right mouse button
Place/delete blocks - Left/right mouse button while in dream mode
Pause - Escape

Contributors

  • Leo Jansson - Code, Level Design
  • Casey MacNeil - Visuals
  • Bauke Regnerus - Bouncy Block, Programmer
  • Jacob S. - Art, NPCs
  • Nicholas Smith - Code, Visuals, Sound, Tutorial
  • Yosi - Code, Shaders
  • Ahmed Yasir - Level Design
  • SurgDev - Slime & Ice
  • Mason Young - Music
  • Katsaii - Concept
  • Sohom Sahaun - Organization
  • TonyStr - Dream Mode
  • nut4985 - Switch Art
  • King Cubing - Moral Support
